title: 2 Easy Ways to Mute Someone on Snapchat Without Blocking

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This is the white ghost with a yellow background. [1] X Research source Snapchat is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . If you aren't already logged in, tap Sign in to do so now, or create an account .

steps.title: Tap the Chat icon.
steps.content: Tap the Chat icon. This is the text box icon on the bottom toolbar, to the left of the camera. You'll see a list of all your recently messaged friends.

steps.title: Tap and hold the user you want to mute.
steps.content: Tap and hold the user you want to mute. A pop-up menu will open for that user. [2] X Research source If the user you want to mute isn't in your recently messaged, tap your profile picture in the top-left corner → My Friends → tap and hold the user.

steps.title: Tap Chat Settings.
steps.content: Tap Chat Settings . This will be underneath Manage Friendship .

steps.title: Toggle off "Message Notifications".
steps.content: Toggle off "Message Notifications". The switch will turn grey.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . You can find this at the very bottom. You will no longer receive notifications when this Snapchat user messages you. However, you can still read messages with or without the user knowing . To unmute message notifications, toggle the Message Notifications switch on so it turns blue. You can also change the notification sound . If you want to mute the user's Snapchat Story to make it disappear from your feed, proceed to the next section.

steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This is the white ghost with a yellow background. [3] X Research source If you aren't already logged in, tap Sign in to do so now.

steps.content: Tap the Chat icon. This is the text box icon on the bottom toolbar, to the left of the camera. You'll see a list of all your recently messaged friends.

steps.content: Tap and hold the user you want to mute. A pop-up menu will open for that user. [4] X Research source If the user you want to mute isn't in your recently messaged, tap your profile picture in the top-left corner → My Friends → tap and hold the user.

steps.title: Tap Story Settings.
steps.content: Tap Story Settings . This will be underneath Chat Settings . [5] X Research source A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Toggle on "Mute Story".
steps.content: Toggle on "Mute Story". A pop-up menu will open for confirmation. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Mute.
steps.content: Tap Mute . This is the grey button. The grey switch will turn blue.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . You can find this at the very bottom. You will no longer see this Snapchat user's Story on your Stories page. This is where you can see who viewed your Story . To unmute a user's story, toggle the Mute Story switch off so it turns grey.
